comment.author: 36844288@N00
comment._content: What a lovely image! Taken, I think, on the traverser/turntable in Poplar trolleybus depot (in east London) it looks like an L3 class 1467 (FXH 467) one of the 1939 deliveries that went into service with the last big tram/trolleybus conversion in 1940. The 567 ran from Aldgate out to West Ham.
